data_ownership.description: All biosignals and biophysical tokens are host-local, non-financial, and cannot be transferred, staked, or traded.

anti_capture.description: Authors, maintainers, platforms, and regulators obey the same safety and non-financial rules as this host; no privileged override is allowed.

roles_and_access.role_semantics: Roles grant responsibilities (e.g., proposing changes or conducting research), not hierarchy. No role may bypass host consent or safety invariants.

brain.description: Cognitive/learning capacity and history for this host only.

wave.description: Workload safety and neurorights envelope for this host.

blood.description: Lifeforce guardrail; cannot be reduced below hard_floor by any evolution or adjustment pipeline.

oxygen.description: Oxygen/lifeforce guardrail; cannot be reduced below hard_floor by any evolution or adjustment pipeline.

smart.description: SMART autonomy band (0 = off, 1 = full autonomy); changes require explicit consent.

evolve.description: Per-host evolution metric; cannot be bought, sold, bridged, or used as an external compliance score.

profile.description: This host prefers high challenge and higher pain tolerance within safety limits. These settings are strictly local and must never be used as defaults or recommendations for other hosts.

safety.rule: No negative externalization of cost to other hosts’ lifeforce or eco budgets; all upgrade costs must be paid from this host’s own envelopes and eco budgets.

consent_and_identity.consent_semantics: All evolution upgrades, SMART autonomy changes, and high-risk changes to pain thresholds or augmentation scope must present a valid DemonstratedConsentShard + ConsentProof. Runtime must hard-fail if consent does not match the requested action.

rules: No actor may seize, collateralize, or re-route this host’s biophysical tokens.
No actor may gate core neural functionality or basic access to biophysical data behind payment or subscription.
No actor may create privileged override paths; all must obey the same invariants and consent requirements.

ai_chat_boundary.description: AI chats and external services may only access redacted summaries and submit typed SystemAdjustment proposals. Inner ledger state and raw biophysical data are never exposed.
